"What?": "Emergency announcement. We are currently preparing for a large-scale operation in the Aelio Region. All ARKS, prepare to sortie."
"Can you read me? It hasn't been confirmed, but we've picked up a signal that appears to be Dark Falz."
"I'm currently readying the Central Cannon. Please be prepared to intercept at a moment's notice. Thank you."
"Did you hear that? He said it could be Dark Falz."
"Indeed. We were contacted here as well."
"I'm always ready. What about you, Aina?"
"You make sure you're ready too, okay?"
